attributes.review: i opened the app and not all of the content was coming up correctly, causing pain in my head which then triggered my stomach, loosening my bowels and i lived in the restroom for a good week... also, he’s an awful human being doing awful things to people and causing harm to their livelihood.
attributes.title: gave me EXPLOSIVE diarrhea 🤒

attributes.review: Worst app ever it was taking forever to download and the app has the worst quality everrrr ! I tried to check when was the next rally and it was taking a really long time to show up so yeah this app should be taken down from Thai app immediately.

First of all my dog got a virus with I did not except and after that beast boy from teen titans go came running out of my screen and the shocked me with anesthesia CAN U BELIVE THAT THEN my fridge did a whole back flip and killed my pet dodo which I don’t think is normal and then my pet murder hornet voided away I can’t belive this. 😖
attributes.title: Pure garbage

attributes.review: So I went on the app and there I saw a hot Cheeto 😭 it was just sitting there but worst of all there was a monkey next to the Cheeto 😒 I felt so harassed 🤨 I was honestly scared for my life 🌶🌶 this app is so bad and scary NEVER GET TGIS APP THIS IS THE WORST APP ON THE APP STORE 👁👄👁 I was HARASSED 😌 the money also was shaved like it was littarlly skin and bones they prob never fed it isn’t that like animal abuse 😌😔 JUSTICE FOR TGE MONKEY THAT WAS STANING NEXT TK THE CHEETO🧍🏾‍♀️🐉
attributes.title: This app is so offensive

attributes.review: This app was very traumatizing. I was having a wonderful day I woke up went down the stairs while opening this app. I was completely shocked by what I saw. The scary figure made me tumble down and die. Such a scary experience do not get this cursed app or the same might happen to you.
attributes.title: Very scary

attributes.review: I opened the app to see that I need to enter a mobile number. I wasn’t super happy to see that being I don’t want to subscribe to mobile messages. The rewards program is silly. I deleted this app and will never reconsider downloading again.
attributes.title: Poorly Ran

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to show support but as soon as I opened it I was greeted by a Cheeto puff calling me the f slur and saying he was going to steal my children and eat my toes. I have never been so shocked and disgusted in my life. To think that this man’s mushroom hasn’t fallen off from the weight of his sins is devastating.
attributes.title: Distracting and disrespectful

attributes.review:

attributes.title: My hampster was posesed and ate my cat

attributes.review: This app is the worst one yet. It took my sink an ate it. Shortly after I heard a knock on the door so I went to go get it then I lagged out an ended up back in the sinkless bathroom. Then I tried to uninstall the app but I heard a voice coming from my closet telling me if I do so they will lick my eyebrows off. I was not havin ittttt😌🤠
attributes.title: Knee cap hair🙈👁👄👁

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I would know when Toddler in Chief’s rallies were, so I could show up and get Coronavirus, but when I opened up the app, his face was on the front and I just barfed all over my dog. Would not recommend, unless you’re into that kind of thing 🤷🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: Worst app ever
